game.name: The Sims™ 3 Town Life Stuff
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Sims 3 Town Life Stuff introduces venues complete with dozens of new objects to give your Sims’ town and homes a makeover.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Sims 3 Town Life Stuff introduces venues complete with dozens of new objects to give your Sims’ town and homes a makeover.
